title: Jin Ken Mamoru-kun to Ayumi-chan Sekai wo Shiawase ni
original_name: 人 KEN まもる君とあゆみちゃん 世界をしあわせに
sinopse: Character designs by Takashi Yanase, creator of Anpanman, this official Ministry of Justice commissioned anime teachers children about how to peruse happiness for themselves and others through truth.
